Uses of Package
net.sf.JRecord.External

  • Packages that use net.sf.JRecord.External 
    Package Description
    net.sf.JRecord.External
    This package holds classes that convert Record-Layouts (copybooks) between external Files and the internal representation.
    net.sf.JRecord.IO
    This package holds all Record-Oriented IO routines.
    net.sf.JRecord.def.IO.builders
    This package holds the IOBuilder definitions.
    net.sf.JRecord.utilityClasses  
  • Classes in net.sf.JRecord.External used by net.sf.JRecord.External 
    Class and Description
    BaseCopybookLoader 
    CopybookLoader
    description of a class to load a copybook (i.e.
    CopybookLoaderFactory
    Generate a copybook loader based on the loader id (index) supplied by the calling program.
    CopybookWriterManager
    Class to manage all the Copybook Writer class's
    CsvNamesFirstLineFileLoader
    Class to build a copybook (ExternalRecord) from a CSV file with the names on the first line
    ExternalRecord
    This class holds the interchange format of of a RecordLayout.
    ExternalRecord.FieldAdjustmentOptions 
    IBasicSchemaBuilder 
    ICopybookLoaderCobol 
    ICopybookLoaderStream 
    ICsvSchemaBuilder 
    IFixedWidthSchemaBuilder 
    ISetDropCopybookName 
    ToExternalRecord
    Class to convert a RecordLayout (internal Format) to The Interface format (ExternalRecord)] that can be written to a file / saved in a DB (RecordEditor)
    ToLayoutDetail
    Deprecated. 
    use externalRecord.asLayoutDetail() instead
